title: Hyottoshite Gyaru wa Orera ni Yasashii no Dewa? Anthology Comic
description:
Published by Rex Comics with the cover illustrated by Hisasi (vol.1), this manga anthology is a collection of 7 stories over 140 pages (each drawn by a different artist) about attractive gyarus who for some reason treat our good for nothing protagonists kindly compared to others.

List of stories and authors:
Vol. 1 cover by [b]Hisasi[/b]
[spoiler] 1. [i]Secrets between an Otaku and a Gal[/i] by [b]Oono Imo[/b]
2. [i]The 3 Gal siblings and the tough Tetsuo-kun[/i] by [b]Nishizono Fumiko[/b]
3. [i]This is a story about a Gal falling in love with my best friend[/i] by [b]Shinonome Shino[/b]
4. [i]My neighbour, Narusawa-san[/i] by [b]Sugawara Kenji[/b]
5. [i]The female university life I look up to[/i]  by [b]gum[/b]
6. [i]Taking back my Rabupoyo☆[/i] by [b]Ugatsu Matsuki[/b]
7. [i]My cool niece and summer vacation[/i] by [b]Rishin[/b][/spoiler]
Vol. 2 cover by [b]Yahiro Pochi[/b]
[spoiler] 1. [i]President Yoshizaki wants to reform![/i] by [b]Hideki[/b]
2. [i]Let me rest, Kirishima-san![/i] by [b]siho[/b]
3. [i]Festival challenge![/i] by [b]Kurusu[/b]
4. [i]Coin Girl[/i] by [b]Kusano Houki[/b]
5. [i]Cheering Song[/i] by [b]Ishihara Yuu[/b]
6. [i]Sensei's my favourite! -Teacher is pet-[/i] by [b]Neko Danshaku[/b]
7. [i]A lesson with you after school[/i] by [b]Sakura Tasuke[/b][/spoiler]
Vol. 3 cover by [b]Ichino Yuyu[/b]
[spoiler] 1. [i]Twin ☆ Sandwich[/i] by [b]Tamura Hiro[/b]
2. [i]The more reckless a gal is, the cuter she is![/i] by [b]Manishi Mari[/b]
3. [i]Nishijima-san, the heart-broken Gal[/i] by [b]Amagi Yuzu[/b]
4. [i]I won't know until you say it?[/i] by [b]9°C[/b]
5. [i]The unrequited glasses and the assertive Gal[/i] by [b]Kurobuchi Kashiko[/b]
6. [i]This is a story about my younger childhood friend gal who has a grasp on my weakness ➁ ~I was dragged along to go to a pool with her during summer vacation~[/i] by [b]Takaba Momo[/b]
7. [i]I want to be bullied by a Gal like her![/i] by [b]Mochi Au Lait[/b]
8. [i]A special lesson with Gal-sensei[/i] by [b]Hamada Ayaka[/b][/spoiler]

Best chapter poll:
https://www.strawpoll.me/18247385
